title: Workshop on Developing Teacher-Led Design-Based Language Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customized language learning design competency enhancement program for professionals.

learning_goals: Develop a 1-week language learning plan utilizing instructional design elements (goals, assessments, activities, resources)
